citation.title: to be published

notes.text: Mikhail Mendelev notes "This Ni-Co-Cr potential is designed to simulate the plastic deformation in the NiCoCr HEA. The potential correctly reproduces all element ground states and melting temperature as well as hcp-fcc transformation in pure Co. Note that the potential was fit to the PBEsol VASP data, therefore, it systematically underestimates the lattice parameters."
This file was provided by Mikhail Mendelev on July 9, 2024.
